hero.title: Beat ATS Systems & Land Your Dream Job
hero.description: Our AI analyzes job descriptions and optimizes your resume for maximum ATS compatibility. Increase your interview callbacks by 300% with personalized keyword matching and professional formatting.
hero.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email to get started
hero.trustText: Free to start • No credit card required • Results in 30 seconds

features.title: AI-Powered Analysis
features.description: Advanced AI analyzes job descriptions to extract key requirements and optimize your resume accordingly.

features.title: ATS Optimization
features.description: Ensure your resume passes Applicant Tracking Systems with optimized keywords and formatting.

features.title: Score Improvement
features.description: See your ATS score improve in real-time as we optimize your resume for specific job postings.

features.title: Professional Templates
features.description: Choose from professionally designed templates that are both ATS-friendly and visually appealing.

features.title: Instant Results
features.description: Get your optimized resume in seconds, not hours. Our AI works at lightning speed.

features.title: Privacy Focused
features.description: Your data is secure and private. We never share your information with third parties.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.text: My ATS score went from 65% to 94% after using this tool. I got 3 interview calls within a week!

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.text: The AI-powered keyword matching is incredible. It found opportunities to highlight my experience that I completely missed.

testimonials.name: Emily Thompson
testimonials.text: Best investment in my job search. The optimized resume helped me land my dream job at a Fortune 500 company.
